name: Merlin
subtitle: Rabbit
author: Michaela Martin

additional_info.title: FAQ for all Merlin animal forms
additional_info.body:
Q: If Merlin is chosen by the effect of Let it Go and placed into my inkwell does his ability trigger?

A: Yes it does. Being placed into the inkwell facedown is treated as leaving play

flavor_text: It was turning out to be a bad hare day.
rules_text: HOPPITY HIP! When you play this character and when he leaves play, you may draw a card.
